column5: Quiet, clean and spacious townhouse off Spring Creek. 4 Bedroom, 2.5 bath. Keyless entry. 2 miles from Highway 75 1 miles from Colin College a few minutes from The Village at Allen,Watters Creek, Allen Premium Outlets,  20 miles from American Airlines Centre and Downtown Dallas 30 miles from DFW airport 23 miles from Dallas Love Field airport  High speed internet Washer/dryer 2 car garage
